item.description: <p>Kitty Whist Night. . At DAMATAS New players welcome, we will teach you how to play. Do not be discouraged enough not to sign up on the waiting list, if full. There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something else there. Pizzas are $2.99 on Monday nights.</p>
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Negation Hearts at DAMATAS in Salem
